        public Cup(int posX,
   int posY,
   com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal.Terminal.Color bgColor,
   com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal.Terminal.Color fgColor)
        cupsize sets the cups width. It shrinks each level. the for loop here simply adds '_' (Underscores) To the Cup
        Parameters:
        posX - same as abstract piece.
        posY - same as abstract piece.
        bgColor - same as abstract piece.
        fgColor - same as abstract piece.

    • Method Detail

      • toggleLeft

        public void toggleLeft()
        We Covered this in the game loop. When movingLeft is true, the cup moves left. When MovingLeft is false the cup is moving..... You guessed it, right.

      • updateX

        void updateX()
        moves the cup in the appropriate direction based on movingLeft.

      • updateY

        public void updateY(int newY)
        This function is only called when the game resizes. It sets the cup back to the appropriate number of spaces off the bottom.
        Parameters:
        newY - the new value of Y. Always gamescreen.rows - 4;

      • getCupSize

        public int getCupSize()

      • modCupSize

        public void modCupSize(int cupMod)
        Modifies the size of the cup.
        Parameters:
        cupMod - this number should always be a multiple of two. (Won't be catastrophic if it's not, you'll just an uneven cup). This number modifies the size of the cup.
